events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
System identified this case as related to a refund request based on the customer's message.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and the order number to verify the issue?
Sure, I’ve attached a photo of the item and my order number is 123456789. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and will wait for the refund to appear on my account.
Your refund request has been completed successfully. Please contact us again if you have any further questions.
Just following up to ensure that your refund was received without any issues. Let us know if you need any more assistance.
Since your concern has been resolved and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting support.
